billEvents.eventText: referred to consumer affairs and protection

title: Relates to the sale and use of gift certificates
summary: Relates to the sale and use of gift certificates; requires that gift certificates last for at least seven years; requires that the date of issuance and the date of expiration of a gift certificate be either printed on the gift certificate, printed on a customer's receipt, or available through an internet and toll-free telephone service.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to the sale and use of gift certificates and gift cards
